name: Vocabulot
description:
Vocabulot

👉 A fast-paced word game!

Vocabulot is a fast-paced word game that will put your vocabulary to the test. The game is easy to learn but hard to master: your goal is to find as many words as possible until you run out of time. Words are worth both points and extra time: the longer words you find, the longer you will survive.

You are not limited by adjacent tiles but by the speed of your thinking and the size of your vocabulary. And if you prefer to play more leisurely, there's also an alternative game mode without time limit.

You can compete with other players on online leaderboards. Both game modes, Classic and Unlimited, have their own leaderboards.

Free Version is fully playable but if you pay $3.00 or more, you get the Full Version of the game! ✨ The full version includes additional gameplay statistics.

Free VersionFull Version
$3.00 or more⏰ Classic Mode✅✅🧩 Unlimited Mode✅✅🏆 Leaderboards✅✅📈 Some statistics✅✅🔓 Achievements to unlock✅✅📊 All statistics❌✅ Languages

The game is currently available in three languages:

  • English
  • Finnish
  • Swedish

All languages have separate leaderboards.

Controls Windows

Mouse only (left click) or Mouse + Keyboard

Show keyboard controls
  • Letter Keys → Select tiles
  • Shift + Letter Key → Select the multiplier tile
  • Enter → Enter a word
  • Backspace → Delete letters
  • Esc → Give up
Android

One-Finger Tap
